reasons_to_visit.details: World-renowned International Music Festival Český Krumlov features classical performances in historic venues including the baroque theatre.
July offers the warmest temperatures and longest days, perfect for all outdoor activities.
Vltava River activities are at their peak with ideal conditions for rafting, canoeing, and riverside relaxation.
All attractions have extended summer hours, maximizing your sightseeing opportunities.
Perfect weather for dining in historic courtyards and outdoor terraces throughout the town.

reasons_to_avoid.details: July is the busiest month with peak tourist crowds, especially during the music festival.
Peak season pricing with the highest accommodation and dining costs of the year.
Everything requires booking well in advance, especially during festival weeks.
July can be uncomfortably hot for extensive outdoor walking, especially midday.
